subject: French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: During the second set of the men’s final, a serial publicity seeker jumped the barrier and onto Roger Federer’s half of the court, eluded security and tried to force a hat onto his head.
snippet: During the second set of the men’s final, a serial publicity seeker jumped the barrier and onto Roger Federer’s half of the court, eluded security and tried to force a hat onto his head.
